comments.comment: Our people are very suspicious about any thing unusual. We are trying hard to attract tourists from all parts the world. This Bhora convention is one of the most successful projects in the recent times bringing over 20,000 rich Bhoras to the country. If this is inconvenient, how about Gangarama perahara, poson in Anuradhapura, even Kandy perahara. They also have become profitable tourist attractions. Looks like it is the three wheel drivers who have been waiting to fleece these people, not being able to do that are unhappy. Our people are somewhat shellfish in that, we are trying very hard to get jobs in Korea, Singapore, Middle East, Japan etc. When those people come here why are we grumbling?
comments.author: Jayantha Ranatunga
